summary: Position in audio timeline, connect this to the Position-port of a Transport-op

ports.name: Bars:Beats:Sixteenth
ports.text: A string in the form Bars:Beats:Siyteenth, e.g. `14:3:2`. Mostly you will connect this to the `Position (BarsBeatsSixteenth)`-port of the `Transport`-op.

ports.name: Bars
ports.text: In which bar the timeline is at right now

ports.name: Beats
ports.text: In which beat of the current bar the timeline is at right now. In 4/4 music one bar consist of 4 beats.

ports.name: Sixteenth
ports.text: In which sixteenth of the current beat the timeline is at right now. In 4/4 music one beat consist of 4 sixteenth.

ports.name: Sixteenth (Precise)
ports.text: Same as the `Sixteenth`-port, but more precise
